title: jeremypwr
author: jeremypwr
created_time: July 24, 2023, 04:40:45 PMLast edit: July 29, 2023, 03:16:16 PM by jeremypwr
content: UFC 291Multi Master Challenge   Prizes1st place: 3 mBTC Free Bet2nd place: 2 mBTC Free Bet3rd place: 1 mBTC Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1-2 points)b)  Predict how many matches will NOT go the Full Distance (will be adjusted accordingly if matches get cancelled)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-291-poirier-vs-gaethje-2/matchesMatches(2 points each)12. Dustin Poirier vs. Justin Gaethje(must get 12 correct to proceed)11. Jan Blachowicz vs. Alex Pereira10. Stephen Thompson vs. Michel Pereira9. Tony Ferguson vs. Bobby Green8. Michael Chiesa vs. Kevin Holland(1 point each)7. Gabriel Bonfim vs. Trevin Giles6. Derrick Lewis vs. Marcos Rogerio de Lima5. Roman Kopylov vs. Claudio Ribeiro4. Jake Matthews vs. Miguel Baeza3. C.J. Vergara vs. Vinicius Salvador2. Matthew Semelsberger vs. Uros Medic1. Miranda Maverick vs. Priscila CachoeiraNOT go the Full Distance   Make sure your Prediction is in this format    Example12. Dustin Poirier 11. Jan Blachowicz 10. Stephen Thompson 9. Tony Ferguson 8. Michael Chiesa 7. Gabriel Bonfim 6. Derrick Lewis 5. Roman Kopylov 4. Jake Matthews 3. C.J. Vergara 2. Matthew Semelsberger 1. Miranda Maverick NOT go the Full Distance 10(Small print)* Must be active in Gambling and/or Gambling discussion (some exceptions) *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion **

comments.author: jeremypwr
comments.body: Sportsbet.io has been kind enough to sponsor my Prediction Contests and Promos for a while now.Sportsbet.io is a sports betting website; therefore these Prediction Contests and Promos are catered to those who actually bet on/discuss sports.Given the nature of my threads, please do not bother making a Prediction if you have not read the OP and qualify.If you are unsure if you qualify, just shoot me a PM.  Thank you for your cooperation.If I post that a match has been cancelled but you still include it in your prediction, your prediction will not count
